articles.title: Chinese leader Xi issues a positive message at a meeting with US business leaders as ties improve - The Associated Press
articles.description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping has called for closer trade ties with the U.S. during a meeting with top American business leaders in Beijing. The meeting on Wednesday came amid a steady improvement in relations that had sunk to the lowest level in years. Xi emphas…
